name: Chromie
title: Keeper of Time
description: Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain.

role.name: Assassin
role.description: Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain.

abilities.name: Sand Blast
abilities.description: After 1 second, fire a missile that deals 300 damage to the first enemy Hero hit. Quest: Hit 60 Heroes with Sand Blast. Consecutive hits without missing count as hitting 2 Heroes. Reward: Each Hero hit increases Sand Blast's damage by 5. Reward: After hitting 60 Heroes, casting Sand Blast leaves an Echo behind. The next time Sand Blast is cast, the Echo also casts an untalented Sand Blast that deals 40% damage.

abilities.name: Dragon’s Breath
abilities.description: Fire a blast into the air that lands after 1.5 seconds, dealing 480 damage to enemies in an area. Enemies cannot see where the blast will land.

abilities.name: Time Trap
abilities.description: Place a Time Trap that arms and Stealths after 2 seconds. The first enemy Hero to touch it is placed in Time Stop for 2 seconds. Only 1 trap can exist at once.

heroics.name: Slowing Sands
heroics.description: Place a sand vortex that greatly Slows enemies inside it. The longer it is active the more it Slows, up to 60% after 3 seconds.

heroics.name: Temporal Loop
heroics.description: Choose an enemy Hero. After 3 seconds, they will teleport back to the location where Temporal Loop was cast on them.

original.name: Chromie
original.title: Keeper of Time
original.description: At first glance, Chromie appears to be an ordinary gnome. In truth, she is Chronormu, Bronze Dragon and a master of time. When it comes to temporal manipulation there's no problem she can't solve... with some help from her future self, of course.
original.shortDescription: A long range, high burst damage Mage, who requires good timing and setup.

baseHeroInfo.name: Chromie
baseHeroInfo.title: Keeper of Time
baseHeroInfo.description: At first glance, Chromie appears to be an ordinary gnome. In truth, she is Chronormu, Bronze Dragon and a master of time. When it comes to temporal manipulation there's no problem she can't solve... with some help from her future self, of course.
baseHeroInfo.shortDescription: A long range, high burst damage Mage, who requires good timing and setup.

role.name: Assassin
role.description: Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain.

trait.name: Timewalker
trait.description: Chromie has traveled to the future, and as such, will learn her Talents 2 levels earlier than her teammates!

abilities.description: After 1 second, fire a missile that deals 300 damage to the first enemy Hero hit. Quest: Hit 60 Heroes with Sand Blast. Consecutive hits without missing count as hitting 2 Heroes. Reward: Each Hero hit increases Sand Blast's damage by 5. Reward: After hitting 60 Heroes, casting Sand Blast leaves an Echo behind. The next time Sand Blast is cast, the Echo also casts an untalented Sand Blast that deals 40% damage.

skins.name: Keeper of Time
skins.description: At first glance, Chromie appears to be an ordinary gnome. In truth, she is Chronormu, Bronze Dragon and a master of time. When it comes to temporal manipulation there's no problem she can't solve... with some help from her future self, of course.

skins.name: Timewalker Chromie
skins.description: The vestments of a Bronze Dragon are blessed by a power that exists beyond time and space. They are a fragment of both who Chromie was and who she is still yet to be.

skins.name: Dream Genie Chromie
skins.description: Despite their immense magical power, Luxorian genies usually guide and influence mortals by appearing in their dreams. Chromie, however, favors a more direct approach.

skins.name: Fel Queen Chromie
skins.description: There are an infinite number of timelines and fixing any one of them can be a tricky proposition. But this one where Chromie is Queen of the Fel Drakes? Yeah, that seems worth looking into.
